post.title: Drawing Hand Asset
post.description: If you want something simple to use as a drawing hand asset then we've got you covered!
post.content:
If you want something simple to use as a drawing hand asset this asset has you covered!

Free vtuber asset a drawing hand üíõ if you would like to follow my kofi page I will post vtuber assets some free some not as free but will be fun to browse the Kub shop!

Link to the shop/ asset down in the comments üíõ pic.twitter.com/uYCpMm8aVx

— HoneyKub üß∏ COMMS OPEN ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è (@Honey_Kub) July 15, 2022
